name: Tiny Dungeon (Beardstein)
description:
Dodge enemies, shoot fireballs and flip switches!

All to get that sweet loot!

WASD to move and the arrow keys to attack.

Press spacebar to restart the game.

Press all the switches in a room to open the door to the next room.

Can you make it to the end?

Love the tunes?

All music written and performed by Pazuzu.

Made for the 2016 low rez jam.

Thanks for playing!

Tell me what you liked or hated in the comments.

Version 1.1 - improved firing responsiveness
